    • Method Detail

      • load

        public <TConfig> java.util.Optional<TConfig> load(java.lang.Class<TConfig> configClass,
                                                  java.io.File file)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigProvider
        Loads the given config file using provided file.

        Will try to map the loaded config to the given config class. Uses the config class as default values if no config is found.

        Specified by:
        load in interface ConfigProvider
        Type Parameters:
        TConfig - type of the config
        Parameters:
        configClass - the class of the config
        file - the file to load
        Returns:
        the loaded config file or the created default config if it did not exist

      • save

        public <TConfig> void save(TConfig config,
                           java.io.File file)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigProvider
        Serializes the given object as a config and saves it into the given file.

        This will override any existing file with the given config. Use the ConfigProvider.save(Object, File, boolean) method with the override false flag to not overwrite any existing file.

        Specified by:
        save in interface ConfigProvider
        Type Parameters:
        TConfig - type of the config
        Parameters:
        config - the config to save
        file - the target to save to

      • save

        public <TConfig> void save(TConfig config,
                           java.io.File file,
                           boolean overwrite)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigProvider
        Serializes the given object as a config and saves it into the given file.

        Will overwrite the file if overwrite is set to true.

        Specified by:
        save in interface ConfigProvider
        Type Parameters:
        TConfig - type of the config
        Parameters:
        config - the config to save
        file - the target to save to
        overwrite - true to overwrite any existing file
